triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses formation control specifically for multiagent systems, which is the core framework being controlled.

triples.name: Fuzzy control system
triples.relevance: The paper explicitly proposes adaptive fuzzy control technology as part of its fixed-time convergence approach.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: Adaptive control is the foundational methodology used to handle uncertain and time-varying parameters in the proposed approach.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: The paper specifically addresses nonlinear multiagent systems with uncertain dynamics.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: Control theory provides the mathematical foundation for the formation control and fixed-time convergence methods proposed.

triples.name: Control-Lyapunov function
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a fixed-time convergence approach using Lyapunov-based analysis to guarantee system stability and convergence within a predetermined time.
